name: Capalyze
tagline: ChatGPT for datavores:¬†scrape ‚Üí ask ‚Üí visualize
description: Scrape real data from websites in real-time into Univers (our spreadsheet engine with 27.5k stars on GitHub!). Ask questions, visualize with interactive tables & charts, and then slice, dice, and export ‚Äî all in one place.

name: Person search API
tagline: Find anyone with just one API call
description: The ultimate search for people data on the web for AI agents and platforms - comprehensive, targeted, and programmatic With 60+ filters (& unlimited ways to combine them), you can find exactly who you need to sell to, hire, or invest in with one API call

name: CodeWords
tagline: Turn ideas into automations by chatting with AI
description: CodeWords turns plain English into powerful automations in minutes. Build, edit, deploy and fix workflows by chatting with Cody, your AI workflow builder. Connect tools, create complex logic through code, and deploy workflows without setup or configuration.

name: Simply Piano for Apple Vision Pro
tagline: A whole new way to learn piano
description: Simply Piano for Apple Vision Pro brings music learning into the future. With floating finger numbers, a virtual keyboard, and a life-like ‚Äúlive‚Äù performance mode, playing the piano feels immersive, intuitive, and magically playful.

name: DeepTagger
tagline: From Documents to Structured Data with Interactive Labelling
description: DeepTagger is a no-code platform that makes your judgment scalable. It uses your annotations as an example to extract information from new documents. Highlight what matters to you once, and let DeepTagger handle the rest with precision. API access included.

name: Elasticsearch DevTools for VS Code
tagline: IDE DevTools for Elasticsearch and OpenSearch, by Pulse
description: A Kibana DevTools-like interface within your IDE, and more powerful than ever. Stream files, persist query pane, query and mapping validation, mock data generation, and more ‚Äî all from inside VS Code. Brought to you by the experts at Pulse.

name: Luvu
tagline: Your unhinged fitness accountability buddy
description: Luvu is a relentlessly unhinged marshmallow that uses memory-enhanced AI and computer vision to provide live personalized motivation while you work out. He's your accountability partner that listens, remembers, & adapts to your motivation style.

name: Gamma 3.0
tagline: Your design partner for effortless decks, websites, and more
description: A generational leap for the world's most popular AI presentation tool.

name: ContentLift by YAi
tagline: Bring Fact-Checking & Quality Control to Your AI Content
description: AI drafts content fast, but often gets facts wrong and sounds off. ContentLift is the fact-checking and quality layer that makes AI drafts accurate, clear and on-brand - verifying sources, fixing claims and refining tone so you can publish with confidence.

name: kluster.ai
tagline: Never ship broken AI code again
description: Over 40% of AI-generated code contains issues. kluster.ai automatically reviews and fixes code in real-time as AI writes it, instantly correcting bugs, preventing security vulnerabilities, and fixing logic errors right in your favorite IDE.

name: Custom Waitlist
tagline: Create stunning, customizable landing pages with no code
description: CustomWaitlist.com takes away all that hassle, so you can whip up a sleek, branded waitlist page in just minutes, with no code required. That way, you get right into collecting awesome user feedback and signups to validate your brilliant idea super quickly! üöÄ

name: Bult.ai
tagline: Deploy any apps in seconds, no DevOps required
description: Bult simplifies CI/CD pipelines, auto-deployments, and product launches. Build, deploy, and scale apps in minutes without DevOps complexity. Perfect for developers and startups.

name: Alyx: Caffeine Kit
tagline: A caffeine tracker with attitude and no accountability
description: Alyx helps you log caffeine, visualize its impacts, and see how it affects your sleep. It may help you rethink that third espresso. Or, encourage you to drink several more. There's really no way to know.

name: Learn your way
tagline: Reimagining textbooks for every learner
description: Learn your way uses AI to transform static textbook material into personalized, interactive learning guides. it adapts content to a student's grade level and interests to create a more engaging and effective study experience.

name: In Your Face for iOS
tagline: The meeting reminder you can‚Äôt ignore
description: Never miss another meeting, ever again ‚Äì even if you're a hyper-focussed deep-work person: Full screen reminder that gets you to join that meeting right on time. Fully customizable, purposefully annoying to make sure you never be late again.

name: UI Playground 2.0
tagline: Support for Liquid Glass UI components on iOS 26
description: Major update with support for the new Liquid Glass UI components, such as Tab Bar with search, Slider with tick marks, grouped buttons on Navigation and Toolbar, glass buttons, among other major changes. If you want to adopt Liquid Glass, this app is for you!

name: Noxionite
tagline: The most beautiful blog made with Notion
description: Transform your Notion pages into a beautiful, blazing-fast blog. Noxionite is a free, open-source engine packed with features: graph view, automatic social images, multi-language support, and a gorgeous glassmorphism design. Your new blog is waiting.

name: Cardinal
tagline: Build your document workflow with one API
description: Cardinal is built for the hardest documents. Where LLMs hallucinate and miss structure, and traditional OCR tools are inaccurate, Cardinal delivers precise, structured data with bounding boxes you can trust.

name: Ask your Repository
tagline: Get insights from your research, just by asking AI
description: Ask your Repository brings AI-powered, natural-language search to your research workflow ‚Äî from raw data in Condens to validated insights in Slack, Teams, and stakeholder-ready Magazines. It‚Äôs like having a researcher always available to answer your questions.

name: PeekNote 2.0
tagline: Lightweight always-on-top notes for devs & multitaskers
description: PeekNote has been reimagined with unlimited tabs, advanced text blocks, a redesigned UI, smoother interactions, and more reliable saving. It‚Äôs no longer just a note-taker ‚Äî it‚Äôs a productivity powerhouse for developers and creators.
